name: DURIAN KAHWIN 1KG
description: Our Durian Kahwin is a special because of its durian varieties, created when different durian trees naturally cross pollinate. This “married” durian combines the best traits of its parents, rich aroma, smooth texture, and balanced flavor.

name: DURIAN KAHWIN A PACKAGE
description: A premium hand-packed mix of Malaysia’s best durians each fruit carefully selected and recorded for the perfect balance of flavor, creaminess, and aroma. Our Durian Kahwin A Package combines top quality varieties to deliver a truly rich and satisfying durian experience in every bite. Ideal for sharing or gifting to durian lovers who appreciate the finest taste.
